init

Method Detail

athleteActivities

public any athleteActivities(string token, date startDate, [array activities='[runtime expression]']) 
returns an array of activities for the current athlete

Parameters:
token - the OAuth token for athlete
startDate - the start date to retrieve activities from
activities - an array of activiites if method is invoked recursively

listSegmentEfforts

public array listSegmentEfforts(string token, numeric id, [numeric perPage='10']) 
returns an array of SegmentEffort instances by Segment id

Parameters:
token - the OAuth token for athlete
id - the Segemnt id
perPage - the number of instances to return

listSegmentEffortsForAthlete

public array listSegmentEffortsForAthlete(string token, numeric id, numeric athleteId, [numeric perPage='10']) 
returns an array of SegmentEffort instances by Segment and Athlete ids

Parameters:
token - the OAuth token for athlete
id - the Segemnt id
athleteId - the Athlete id
perPage - the number of instances to return

types - the stream types
